2. EVOGTK GUI module¶

2.1. guiclass – EVOGTK GUI class definition module¶

This is the module that contains all base GUI utility classes

2.2. EVOGTK GUI Class¶

class evogtk.gui.guiclass.GUIClass(guifiles=[], configfile=None, mainapp=True, env=None, controlled_quit=True, dialogs=True, splash=True, debug=False, localedir='locale', pixmapsdir='pixmaps', disablenotifsys=False, forceinternalnotifsys=False, **kwargs)¶

GUI helper base class

This class will allow you to start the application

Note

You always want to subclass this class. There are some methods you would like to redefine such as initialize

class MyAppClass(GUIClass):
    pass
debug_status()¶

Returns debug setting

get_gui_task()¶

Returns current GUI task mode

hide_splash(callback=None)¶

Hides the splash screen

initialize()¶

Dummy initialize method for application

quit(userbreak=False, status=0)¶

Finish application

Parameters:
  • userbreak (bool) – Allow user to use Ctrl-C to finish application
  • status (int) – Specifies which status code is returned on application quit

Warning

This method will try to quit application, and will wait for all threads to finish. So if you have threads working, application will remain stopped while waiting.

quitApplication(widget, event=None)¶

Show default quit dialog

run()¶

Launch main application loop

savePreferences(widget=None)¶

Save application preferences

set_environment(env, strict=True)¶

Set application environment if needed

set_gui_task(mode)¶

Setups GUI for an specified task

showAbout(widget=None)¶

Show default about dialog

showPreferences(widget=None)¶

Show preferences dialog

show_mainwindow(window)¶

Show main window ant take care about splash screen hiding

show_splash(splashimg='splash.png', seconds=3)¶

Shows an splash screen using an image

unload()¶

Dummy cleanup method for application finish

Note

This method should be overloaded mostly for use in plugins
